WorkItem.Description:
Tested with Release 47169,
 
Try and create a new character from Armory, 
Name: Rethlon
Server: Dragonblight
Region: EU
 
Look at pet DrWolf. The second talent in the first row is not loaded. Compare with : http://eu.wowarmory.com/character-talents.xml?r=Dragonblight&cn=Rethlon&gn=The+Eternal
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Wolf (Pet) Talent Dash/Dive does not get loaded from Armory.

Comments.Message: Unfortunately this cannot be helped, the Armory inserts Ghost Talents in the string. If I adjust it to fix this problem, some other talent won't necessarily load for someone else. You'll have to manually set it.
